lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Sept. 30 — The Houston Astros can add another thrilling piece to their stretch run Sunday if pitcher Chris Sampson, who has only two starts this season, can somehow compete with John Smoltz.
snippet: ATLANTA, Sept. 30 — The Houston Astros can add another thrilling piece to their stretch run Sunday if pitcher Chris Sampson, who has only two starts this season, can somehow compete with John Smoltz.
